attributes.action: Make Gender Neutral toilets compulsory for all businesses
attributes.additional_details:
In light of updated guidance issued by the Supreme Court on the definition of a female, members of the transgender community now feel confused and frightened to use toilet facilities across the UK. 
The provision of gender neutral facilities will provide clarity on where we can feel safe without risk of discrimination.
attributes.background: To ensure bathroom and changing facilities are accessible to all genders.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Make Gender Neutral Toilets a legal requirement in all public areas
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725623
